title: MoRUN.net Sticker (desktop notes) 7.6
description: MoRUN.net Sticker is easy to use desktop notes software for Windows. Using desktop notes software you can easily create quick notes any time you need to jot something down. MoRUN.net desktop notes software is perfect for simple note taking, creating different to-do lists, writing down quick information, organizing different kinds of contact information and more. Want to share and discuss what you are writing and doing with your friends and colleagues? MoRUN.net Sticker is desktop sticky notes software that lets you easily communicate with your friends and colleagues - you can easily send desktop notes over LAN or Internet. Various desktop notes settings including default settings can be modified to your preference. MoRUN.net desktop notes program offers many options to customize desktop notes appearance - you can create desktop notes using different fonts and colors, modify desktop notes settings, import *.txt and *.rtf files to desktop notes, save desktop notes in *.txt, *.rtf formats, save desktop notes as pictures (*.jpg, *.bmp formats), automatically backup notes database and much more. MoRUN.net Sticker is desktop sticky notes software that provides an easy way to write down important ideas and thoughts. . Now you don&#039;t have to worry about your personal information being seen by others. MoRUN.net Sticker is organized to maintain three security levels. All information is stored in the data file that is encrypted using 256-bit key AES encryption.
